trans-unit.source: Serves as the base class for system exceptions namespace.
trans-unit.target: 做為系統例外狀況命名空間的基底類別。

trans-unit.source: This class is provided as a means to differentiate between system exceptions and application exceptions.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別被提供做為區別系統例外狀況和應用程式例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: It is the base class of such exceptions as <xref:System.ArgumentException>, <xref:System.FormatException>, and <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: 它是做為這類例外狀況的基底類別<xref:System.ArgumentException>， <xref:System.FormatException>，和<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>。

trans-unit.source: Because <xref:System.SystemException> serves as the base class of a variety of exception types, your code should not throw a <xref:System.SystemException> exception, nor should it attempt to handle a <xref:System.SystemException> exception unless you intend to re-throw the original exception.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.SystemException>可做為各種不同的例外狀況類型的基底類別，您的程式碼不應該擲回<xref:System.SystemException>例外狀況，也不應該嘗試處理<xref:System.SystemException>例外狀況除非您想要重新擲回原始例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.SystemException> uses the HRESULT COR_E_SYSTEM, that has the value 0x80131501.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.SystemException> 會使用 HRESULT COR_E_SYSTEM，具有 0x80131501 的值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.SystemException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.SystemException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.SystemException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.SystemException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error, such as "A system error has occurred."
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式初始化<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>屬性的新執行個體的系統提供的訊息描述錯誤，例如 「 已發生系統錯誤 」。

trans-unit.source: This message takes into account the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 此訊息會考量目前的系統文化特性。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.SystemException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示 <xref:System.SystemException> 執行個體的初始屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 `Nothing`)。

trans-unit.source: The localized error message string.
trans-unit.target: 當地語系化的錯誤訊息字串。

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: 描述錯誤的訊息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.SystemException" /> class with a specified error message.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的錯誤訊息，初始化 <see cref="T:System.SystemException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The content of the `message` parameter should be understandable to the user.
trans-unit.target: 內容`message`參數應該是讓使用者能夠讀懂。

trans-unit.source: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式的呼叫端必須確保這個字串已經被當地語系化 (為了目前系統的文化特性)。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.SystemException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示 <xref:System.SystemException> 執行個體的初始屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 `Nothing`)。

trans-unit.source: The error message string.
trans-unit.target: 錯誤訊息字串。

trans-unit.source: The object that holds the serialized object data.
trans-unit.target: 存放序列物件資料的物件。

trans-unit.source: The contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: 關於來源或目的端的內容資訊。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.SystemException" /> class with serialized data.
trans-unit.target: 使用序列化資料，初始化 <see cref="T:System.SystemException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.
trans-unit.target: 進行還原序列化 (Deserialization) 期間會呼叫這個建構函式，以便重新構成經由資料流傳送的例外狀況物件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [XML and SOAP Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[XML 和 SOAP 序列化](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md)。

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解釋例外狀況原因的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 做為目前例外狀況發生原因的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If the <c>innerException</c> parameter is not a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic), the current exception is raised in a <see langword="catch" /> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>innerException</c> 參數不是 Null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 <see langword="Nothing" />)，則會在處理內部例外狀況的 <see langword="catch" /> 區塊中引發目前的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.SystemException" /> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的錯誤訊息以及造成此例外狀況的內部例外狀況的參考，初始化 <see cref="T:System.SystemException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception can include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 直接因為前一個例外狀況而擲回的例外狀況可能包含對 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 屬性中前一個例外狀況的參考。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 屬性會傳回與傳入建構函式中相同的值；如果 `Nothing` 屬性不提供內部例外值給建構函式，則傳回 null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>)。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.SystemException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示 <xref:System.SystemException> 執行個體的初始屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: The inner exception reference.
trans-unit.target: 內部例外狀況參考。

trans-unit.source: The error message string.
trans-unit.target: 錯誤訊息字串。
